menu.description: Charred corn with spices and cotija-style cheese. Sweet, smoky corn with salty, tangy cheese. Savory with a hint of spice. Charred, caramelized flavor.
Mussels served on toasted bread. Briny, tender mussels with garlic butter on crispy toast. Savory and rich with oceanic flavor. Indulgent appetizer.
Twist on caprese with tomatillo and fried halloumi. Tangy tomatillo with salty, squeaky fried halloumi. Fresh and savory with bright, acidic notes. Unique and flavorful.
Brussel sprouts tossed in pad thai style sauce. Crispy sprouts with sweet, tangy, and slightly spicy pad thai flavors. Savory with peanut and tamarind notes. Unique fusion dish.
Grilled striploin steak with sides. Juicy, tender beef with charred exterior. Savory and rich with beefy flavor. Cooked to your preference. Hearty and satisfying.
Pan-seared tenderloin with jus. Buttery-tender beef with rich, savory jus. Melt-in-your-mouth texture. Luxurious and flavorful. Premium cut.
Pan-grilled Arctic char with seasonal sides. Delicate, flaky fish with mild, slightly sweet flavor. Savory with buttery notes. Light and fresh. Healthy option.
Chicken supreme stuffed with seasonal fillings. Juicy chicken breast with savory stuffing. Rich and flavorful with herbs. Tender and satisfying.
Roasted cod with seasonal veg and sauce. Flaky, mild white fish with tender texture. Savory and light with fresh vegetable accompaniments. Healthy and delicious.
House-breaded fish and chips. Crispy, crunchy coating with tender fish inside. Savory and comforting. Golden and satisfying. Classic pub fare.
Ground lamb burger with toppings. Rich, savory lamb with slightly gamey flavor. Juicy and flavorful. More complex than beef. Gourmet burger option.
Chop cheese style sandwich with beef and cheese. Savory ground beef with melted cheese on toasted bun. Rich, cheesy, and satisfying. Comfort food classic.
Sweet and sour pork with rice. Crispy pork in tangy-sweet sauce with pineapple and peppers. Balanced sweet and sour flavors. Savory with fruity notes.
Tempura-battered mushroom sandwich. Crispy, light tempura coating with meaty mushrooms. Savory and umami-rich. Satisfying vegetarian option.
Vegetarian fettuccine with seasonal veg. Fresh vegetables in light sauce with pasta. Savory with garden-fresh flavors. Healthy and satisfying.
Local mussels prepared per daily style. Tender, briny mussels in flavorful broth. Savory with garlic and wine notes. Fresh oceanic taste.
Crispy salt cod cake served with sauce. Crunchy exterior with flaky, savory cod inside. Salty and rich with traditional Newfoundland flavors. Comfort food.
Local fish cakes with tartar. Golden-fried fish cakes with creamy tartar sauce. Savory, mild fish flavor. Crispy outside, tender inside. Local specialty.
Decadent triple chocolate brownie served with optional featured toppings. Rich, fudgy, and intensely chocolatey. Sweet and indulgent. Chocolate lover's dream.
Classic bread pudding with daily changing flavors. Warm, custardy, and comforting. Sweet with cinnamon notes. Soft and satisfying.
Rich custard topped with a layer of caramelized sugar. Creamy and smooth with crunchy burnt sugar top. Sweet and luxurious. Classic French dessert.
Hot coffee with Jameson's Irish Whiskey, Irish Mist, and whipped cream. Warm, boozy, and sweet. Rich coffee flavor with whiskey kick. Comforting beverage.
Coffee with Screech rum, Cointreau, and whipped cream. Sweet, warming coffee with local rum. Rich and boozy. Newfoundland specialty.
Coffee with Kahlua, brandy, and whipped cream. Sweet coffee liqueur with brandy warmth. Rich and indulgent. Dessert-like beverage.

Mixed artisanal greens with toasted almonds, goat cheese, bacon, dried cranberries, and balsamic vinaigrette. Fresh and crunchy with sweet-savory balance. Tangy goat cheese with sweet cranberries. Satisfying salad.
Creamy chowder with ice shrimp, local cod, mussels, and dill. Rich and hearty with tender seafood. Savory and comforting. Fresh ocean flavors.
Crispy calamari with lemon pepper seasoning and buttermilk ranch sauce. Crunchy fried squid with zesty lemon. Savory with tangy ranch. Light and crispy.
Almond crusted goat cheese with flamed tomato salsa, balsamic reduction, and pesto. Warm, creamy cheese with crunchy almond coating. Savory with sweet-tangy balance. Elegant appetizer.
Pan-fried cod tongues with scrunchions and house-made tartar sauce. Crispy, tender local delicacy with crunchy pork bits. Savory and rich. Newfoundland specialty.
Potato and sour cream crusted cod pan seared with frites and vegetables. Flaky cod with crispy potato crust. Savory and mild. Comforting seafood dish.
Pan-seared local cod with mussels, shrimp, scallops, frites, and vegetables. Variety of fresh seafood with crispy fries. Savory and oceanic. Generous and satisfying.
Halibut with lemon-caper butter, garlic, and Parmesan risotto. Flaky white fish in tangy lemon sauce. Savory with creamy risotto. Bright and rich.
Pasta with sausage, shrimp, mussels in creamy Cajun marinara. Spicy Cajun flavors with seafood and sausage. Rich and bold with heat. Fusion comfort food.
Pasta with mushrooms, chicken, bacon in balsamic cream sauce. Savory chicken with tangy-sweet balsamic. Rich and creamy. Satisfying pasta dish.
Penne pasta with sausage, broccolini, white beans in creamy garlic sauce. Rich, garlicky pasta with savory sausage. Hearty and comforting. Italian-inspired.
Poached eggs with tomato salsa, goat cheese, and hollandaise on English muffins. Creamy eggs with tangy goat cheese. Rich hollandaise with fresh salsa. Elevated brunch classic.
Two eggs any style with toast, hash browns, fruit, and bacon. Classic hearty breakfast with crispy bacon. Savory and satisfying. Traditional morning meal.
Egg scramble with onions, peppers, choice of meat, cheese, and hash browns. Hearty scrambled eggs with savory toppings. Rich and filling. Customizable breakfast.
Classic carbonara with bacon, egg, and Parmesan. Creamy, rich pasta with crispy bacon. Savory and indulgent. Italian comfort food.
Cajun chicken with chipotle mayo, cheddar, bacon on potato bun. Spicy chicken with smoky chipotle. Savory with heat. Bold and flavorful sandwich.
Shaved steak with caramelized onions, provolone, and balsamic mayo. Tender beef with sweet onions. Savory and rich. Hearty sandwich.
Local cod pan-fried with scrunchions. Crispy cod with crunchy pork bits. Savory and traditional. Newfoundland classic.
Sausage with roasted peppers, onions, provolone, and marinara. Savory sausage with sweet peppers. Rich and hearty. Italian-style sub.
Creamy butter chicken served with rice and naan. Rich, mildly spiced tomato-cream sauce. Savory and slightly sweet. Comforting Indian classic.
Sweet bourbon glazed chicken with veggies. Sticky-sweet glaze with bourbon warmth. Savory chicken with caramelized coating. Bold and flavorful.
Duck sandwich with seasonal toppings. Rich, savory duck meat. Slightly gamey with crispy skin. Gourmet sandwich option.
Smoked marinated olives. Briny olives with deep smoky flavor. Savory and complex with earthy notes. Perfect for snacking.
Napa cabbage salad. Crisp, refreshing cabbage with light dressing. Savory and slightly sweet. Crunchy and fresh.
Roasted beets with garnish. Earthy, sweet roasted beets. Savory with natural sweetness. Tender and flavorful.
Radicchio salad with vinaigrette. Bitter, crisp radicchio with tangy dressing. Savory and refreshing. Bold, peppery flavor.
Banh mi inspired salad with pickled veg. Tangy pickled vegetables with fresh herbs. Savory, sweet, and sour flavors. Bright and zesty.
House focaccia bread. Soft, pillowy bread with olive oil and herbs. Savory with rosemary notes. Warm and comforting.
Roasted broccoli with seasoning. Charred, crispy broccoli with savory seasonings. Slightly bitter with nutty, caramelized flavor.
Beef carpaccio styled burger. Thinly sliced raw beef with burger-inspired toppings. Savory, rich, and tender. Unique presentation.
Fresh oysters on the half shell. Briny, fresh oysters with clean ocean flavor. Savory and delicate. Smooth, silky texture.
Toast topped with seared scallops. Sweet, buttery scallops on crispy toast. Savory and luxurious. Tender and rich.
Cured char with accompaniments. Silky, delicate cured fish with bright flavors. Savory with citrus notes. Fresh and elegant.
Portage style mussels. Tender mussels in aromatic broth. Savory with wine and garlic. Fresh and flavorful.
Celeriac preparation as side. Earthy root vegetable with mild celery flavor. Savory and creamy when cooked. Unique and delicious.
Sautéed bok choy. Tender greens with crisp stems. Savory with garlic and ginger notes. Light and fresh.
Rutabaga seasonal dish. Sweet, earthy root vegetable. Savory with natural sweetness. Tender and comforting.
Roasted squash. Sweet, caramelized squash with nutty flavor. Savory and naturally sweet. Tender and satisfying.
Creamy leek gratin. Tender leeks in rich, cheesy sauce. Savory and indulgent. Smooth and comforting.
Pork dumplings with dipping sauce. Juicy pork filling in tender wrapper. Savory with ginger and garlic. Rich and satisfying.
Guinea fowl preparation. Gamey, flavorful bird similar to chicken but richer. Savory and tender. Unique poultry option.
Pork schnitzel with sides. Crispy breaded pork cutlet. Savory and crunchy with tender meat. Classic comfort food.
Ribeye steak with accompaniments. Marbled, juicy steak with rich beefy flavor. Savory and tender. Premium cut with buttery texture.
Seasonal bake-apple dessert. Sweet, tart Newfoundland cloudberries. Unique fruity flavor with honey notes. Local delicacy.

restaurants.restaurant: St. John's Fish Exchange Kitchen & Wet Bar

menu.description: Seared manchego served on ciabatta with fig jam and arugula. Savory and nutty cheese balanced with sweet fig jam and peppery arugula. Rich and indulgent appetizer.
Housemade crab cakes with spicy remoulade and corn relish. Crispy exterior with tender, sweet crab meat inside. Spicy kick from remoulade, balanced with sweet corn. Savory seafood flavor.
Classic New England-style chowder with local seafood. Creamy, rich, and savory with tender chunks of fresh fish. Comforting and hearty with mild, buttery flavor.
Creamy lobster bisque finished with sherry. Rich, velvety, and luxurious with sweet lobster flavor. Savory with a hint of sherry warmth. Smooth and indulgent.
Seasonal vegetable tacos. Fresh, crisp vegetables with savory seasonings. Light and healthy with bright, garden-fresh flavors. Mildly spiced.
Crispy shrimp with slaw and spicy mayo. Crunchy fried shrimp with creamy, spicy sauce. Sweet shrimp flavor with tangy slaw and heat from mayo. Savory and satisfying.
Seared tuna tacos with Asian slaw. Fresh, meaty tuna with tangy, crunchy slaw. Savory with umami notes and slight sweetness. Light and refreshing.
Crispy fried cod tacos with tartar and slaw. Crunchy beer-battered cod with creamy tartar sauce. Savory, mild fish flavor with tangy accompaniments. Comfort food.
Spicy chicken tacos with pickled onions. Bold, spicy chicken with tangy pickled onions. Heat-forward with savory chicken and acidic crunch. Flavorful and zesty.
Slow-cooked BBQ back ribs (half rack). Tender, fall-off-the-bone ribs with sweet and tangy BBQ sauce. Smoky, savory, with caramelized edges. Rich and satisfying.
Slow-cooked BBQ back ribs (full rack). Tender, fall-off-the-bone ribs with sweet and tangy BBQ sauce. Smoky, savory, with caramelized edges. Rich and satisfying.
Rich macaroni and cheese loaded with lobster. Creamy, indulgent cheese sauce with sweet, tender lobster chunks. Savory and luxurious comfort food. Rich and decadent.
Pappardelle tossed with lobster and shrimp in a creamy sauce. Rich, velvety pasta with sweet seafood. Savory and luxurious with garlic notes. Indulgent and satisfying.
Pasta with grilled chicken and basil pesto. Fresh, herbaceous pesto with savory grilled chicken. Bright basil flavor with garlic and parmesan. Light yet satisfying.
Blackened salmon served on grain bowl with vegetables. Spicy Cajun-crusted salmon with nutty grains and fresh vegetables. Savory with a spicy kick. Healthy and flavorful.
Roasted cauliflower with grains and seasonal veggies. Nutty roasted cauliflower with earthy grains. Savory and wholesome with mild, sweet vegetable flavors. Light and nutritious.
One piece beer-battered cod with chips, tartar sauce. Crispy, golden battered fish with fluffy interior. Savory and mild with creamy tartar. Classic comfort food.
Two pieces beer-battered cod with chips, tartar sauce. Crispy, golden battered fish with fluffy interior. Savory and mild with creamy tartar. Classic comfort food.
Three pieces beer-battered cod with chips, tartar sauce. Crispy, golden battered fish with fluffy interior. Savory and mild with creamy tartar. Classic comfort food.
Classic lobster roll. Sweet, tender lobster meat in a buttery toasted bun. Light mayo dressing. Fresh, savory, and indulgent. Maritime classic.
Grilled strip loin with sea salt, cracked peppercorns, and bordelaise sauce. Juicy, tender steak with peppery crust. Savory and rich with wine sauce. Premium beef cut.
Braised beef brisket over fries with cheese curds and Murphy Stout gravy. Rich, tender beef with squeaky cheese curds. Savory and indulgent. Canadian comfort food.
Roasted chicken breast with cranberry-spinach cream cheese crust. Juicy chicken with sweet-tangy cranberry. Savory with creamy feta. Unique flavor combination.
Grilled strip loin with Cajun cream sauce, shrimp, scallops, and roasted pepper cream sauce. Tender steak with sweet seafood. Spicy Cajun flavors. Luxurious combination.
Baked cod in creamy cheddar cheese sauce with scrunchions. Flaky fish in rich cheese sauce. Savory and comforting with crispy pork bits. Newfoundland classic.
Pan-fried cod tongues with scrunchions and tartar sauce. Tender, delicate cod tongues with crunchy texture. Savory local delicacy. Traditional Newfoundland dish.
Pan-roasted scallops with prosciutto and maple Cajun sauce. Sweet scallops with salty prosciutto. Savory with sweet maple and spicy Cajun. Elegant seafood.
Two pieces of beer-battered cod with chips, coleslaw, peas, carrots, and tartar sauce. Crispy golden fish with fluffy interior. Savory and classic. Generous portions.
8oz salmon with Cajun crust and classic shrimp tacos. Spicy blackened salmon with bold seasonings. Savory with heat. Flavorful and satisfying.
Beer-battered cod with spicy coleslaw, sweet chili mayo, and grilled pineapple. Crispy fish with spicy-sweet toppings. Tangy slaw with heat. Tropical fusion flavors.
Pan-seared cod with scrunchions and mustard pickle batter sauce. Crispy cod with tangy mustard sauce. Savory with crunchy pork bits. Traditional preparation.
Beef burger with bacon, cheddar, paniko onion rings, lettuce, red onion, pickles, and house sauce. Loaded burger with crispy onion rings. Savory and indulgent. Signature burger.
Classic beef burger with tomato, lettuce, red onion, pickle, and house sauce. Simple, juicy burger with fresh toppings. Savory and satisfying. Timeless classic.
Newfoundland moose patty with brie, bacon, rhubarb pickles, and crispy onions. Lean, gamey moose with creamy brie. Sweet-tart pickles. Unique local specialty.
Beef patty with Guinness BBQ sauce, Dublin old cheddar, bacon, crispy onions, lettuce, and tomato. Rich burger with sweet-tangy BBQ. Savory with Irish flair. Bold flavors.
Pan-seared chicken breast with sweet cranberry mayo, lettuce, and tomato. Juicy chicken with sweet-tangy sauce. Savory and lighter option. Fresh and flavorful.
Chickpea patty with tzatziki, feta, garlic, onion, parsley, and cilantro. Crispy falafel with cool tzatziki. Savory and herbaceous. Vegetarian Mediterranean option.

Triple-decker sandwich with roasted chicken breast, bacon, lettuce, tomato, black forest ham, cheddar, and mayo. Classic layered sandwich with multiple meats. Savory and filling. Traditional favorite.
Flatbread with chopped steak, sautéed onions, mushrooms, béchamel, mozzarella, and crispy onions. Savory beef with creamy sauce. Rich and hearty. Pizza-style flatbread.
Chicken breast with prosciutto, Swiss cheese, pickled onion, basil pesto mayo, lettuce, and tomato. Savory chicken with salty prosciutto. Fresh pesto flavor. Gourmet sandwich.
Murphy's and molasses braised beef brisket with Swiss cheese and au jus. Tender, slow-cooked beef with melted cheese. Savory with sweet molasses notes. Dippable sandwich.
Sautéed steak with mushrooms, onions, mozzarella, and au jus dip. Tender beef with melted cheese. Savory and rich. Philly-style sandwich.
Roasted turkey with savoury dressing and gravy on fresh bread. Warm, comforting turkey with rich gravy. Savory and homestyle. Traditional comfort food.
Award-winning cakes with cod, crab, potatoes, onions, pickles, and tartar sauce. Crispy seafood cakes with sweet crab. Savory and tender. Local specialty.
Creamy dip with crab meat, ice shrimp, chopped artichokes, and crispy pita chips. Rich, cheesy seafood dip. Savory and indulgent. Perfect for sharing.
Pan-fried with scrunchions, rhubarb pickles, and mustard pickle tartar sauce. Tender cod tongues with tangy pickles. Savory with unique texture. Newfoundland delicacy.
Seared scallops with crispy bacon and maple Cajun sauce, served with peppers. Sweet scallops with salty bacon. Spicy-sweet maple sauce. Elegant appetizer.

Classic nachos with layered tortilla chips, jalapeño, black beans, olives, and cheddar-monterey jack-mozzarella blend. Crispy chips with melted cheese. Savory with spicy jalapeños. Shareable appetizer.
Loaded nachos with roasted tomato, jalapeño, black beans, red onion, ½ lb cheese blend, and BBQ sauce. Heavily loaded with toppings. Spicy, sweet, and savory. Indulgent nachos.
Nachos topped with Murphy's and molasses braised beef brisket, jalapeño, black beans, olives, and cheese blend. Tender beef with spicy toppings. Rich and hearty. Premium nachos.
Crisp romaine with house-made Caesar dressing, bacon, parmesan, and croutons. Creamy, garlicky dressing with crunchy romaine. Savory with salty bacon. Classic salad.
Mixed greens with cherry tomatoes, carrot, sweet/spicy pecans, goat cheese, and herb yogurt dressing. Earthy beets with tangy goat cheese. Sweet and savory. Fresh and colorful.
Slow-braised lamb in red wine and lamb sauce with cream, parmesan, roasted mushrooms, broccoli, and peppers. Rich, tender lamb with earthy mushrooms. Savory and luxurious. Hearty pasta.
Fettuccine with garlic Alfredo sauce and parmesan. Rich, creamy sauce with garlic notes. Savory and indulgent. Classic Italian comfort.
Newfoundland mussels steamed in white wine garlic cream. Tender mussels in aromatic broth. Savory with wine and garlic. Fresh seafood.
Lightly coated in seasoned flour, fried, and tossed in Cajun seasoning. Crispy wings with spicy Cajun kick. Savory and bold. Perfect appetizer or main.
Spinach and cream cheese with crispy bacon, 3-cheese blend, served with tortilla chips and baguette. Creamy, cheesy dip with smoky bacon. Savory and rich. Shareable starter.
Thick-cut Spanish onions with parmesan crust and chipotle mayo. Crispy, crunchy rings with cheesy coating. Savory with spicy mayo. Classic side.
Creamy chowder with shrimp, scallops, mussels, salmon, and cod. Rich, hearty soup with variety of seafood. Savory and comforting. Ocean flavors.
Caramelized onions in red wine and beef broth, topped with croutons, Swiss, mozzarella, and parmesan. Sweet caramelized onions with savory broth. Rich and cheesy. Classic French soup.
Roasted turkey with salt beef, root vegetables, and noodles. Hearty, comforting soup with tender turkey. Savory and homestyle. Traditional comfort.
Shrimp, scallops, and mussels in garlic pesto cream sauce with parmesan. Fresh seafood in herbaceous sauce. Savory and rich. Luxurious pasta.
Fettuccine in spicy tomato sauce with cherry tomatoes and bell peppers. Bright tomato flavor with spicy jalapeño heat. Savory and bold. Vegetarian option with kick.
Traditional braised lamb with root vegetables and mashed potato topping. Rich, tender lamb with creamy potato. Savory and comforting. Irish classic.
Traditional Newfoundland touton sandwich. Fried bread dough with savory fillings. Unique local breakfast item. Soft and doughy.
Hearty moose stew with root vegetables. Rich, gamey meat in savory broth. Tender and warming. Traditional Newfoundland dish.
Local partridgeberry pie served seasonally. Tart, sweet berries in flaky crust. Unique Newfoundland flavor. Traditional dessert.
American cheese, lettuce, tomato, pickle, onion, merchant sauce, fries. Juicy double beef patties with melted cheese. Savory and rich with tangy pickles and special sauce. Classic comfort food.
NL cold water shrimp, basil pistou, parmesan, garlic, shallot. Sweet, tender shrimp in herbaceous basil sauce. Savory with fresh garlic and nutty parmesan. Light and flavorful pasta.
Arrabbiata, basil, parsley, chive, parmesan. Creamy mascarpone-filled pasta in spicy tomato sauce. Rich and indulgent with a spicy kick. Fresh herbs add brightness.
PEI beef, soffritto, garlic, tomato, fennel, parmesan. Slow-cooked beef in rich tomato sauce. Savory and hearty with aromatic fennel. Comforting Italian classic.
Leek cream, roasted mushroom, garlic, parmesan. Earthy roasted mushrooms in creamy sauce. Savory and umami-rich with garlic notes. Vegetarian comfort food.
Soubise, potato, spring greens, crispy onion. Flaky local cod with creamy onion sauce. Mild and savory with crispy texture contrast. Fresh and light.
Carrot puree, charred onion, zucchini, persillade sauce. Tender roasted hen with sweet carrot puree. Savory with herbaceous garlic-parsley sauce. Elegant and flavorful.
Polenta, mushroom, asparagus, jus. Rich, succulent duck with crispy skin. Savory and slightly gamey with earthy mushrooms. Luxurious and satisfying.
8oz butcher cut, salsa verde, red wine jus. Juicy grilled steak with herbaceous green sauce. Savory and rich with bold beef flavor. Classic steakhouse dish.
French baguette, daily whipped butter. Warm, crusty bread with creamy butter. Savory and simple. Perfect starter or side.
Mignonette, lemon, jalapeno hot sauce. Fresh, briny oysters with tangy mignonette. Spicy kick from jalapeño sauce. Clean ocean flavor with heat.
Champagne vinaigrette, parmesan, crispy shallot. Fresh mixed greens with tangy dressing. Savory with nutty cheese and crunchy shallots. Light and refreshing.
Shallot, capers, cornichon, parmesan, truffle aioli, gaufrette potato chips. Raw beef with rich truffle mayo. Savory and luxurious with salty capers. Elegant appetizer.
Citrus, jalapeño, cilantro, corn chips. Fresh, tangy scallops with spicy jalapeño. Bright citrus flavor with heat. Light and zesty.
Ponzu, green onion, jalapeño, Japanese mayo, wontons. Fresh tuna with tangy ponzu and spicy jalapeño. Savory with umami notes. Creamy and crunchy.
Neonato, fennel, white wine, cream. Tender mussels in creamy white wine broth. Savory with aromatic fennel. Rich and comforting.
Romesco sauce, lemon. Crispy fried cod bites with smoky-sweet romesco. Savory with tangy lemon. Crunchy and flavorful.
Cider aioli & calabrian chili aioli. Crispy golden fries with two dipping sauces. Savory with sweet cider aioli and spicy chili aioli. Perfect side.
Wild blueberry compote, mascarpone cream, vanilla cake, lemon curd. Sweet and tangy dessert with creamy layers. Fresh blueberry flavor with bright lemon. Light and refreshing.
Poached rhubarb, vanilla custard, madeleine. Rich, creamy custard with caramelized sugar top. Sweet with tart rhubarb. Smooth and indulgent.
Strawberry, vanilla ice cream, candied cacao nibs. Rich, fudgy brownie with sweet strawberries. Decadent chocolate flavor with cold ice cream. Sweet and satisfying.
Roasted cod with mussels, leeks, artichokes and smoked bacon. Flaky cod with smoky bacon and tender vegetables. Savory and rich. Hearty seafood dish.
Fried pork loin served with potato salad. Crispy breaded pork cutlet with creamy potato salad. Savory and crunchy. Classic comfort food.
Steak frites as seasonal special. Grilled steak with crispy fries. Savory and juicy with bold beef flavor. Simple and satisfying.
Traditional vinegar pie served with Tetley tea ice cream and berries. Sweet and tangy custard pie with unique tea-flavored ice cream. Newfoundland classic dessert.
